meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 10 meters.
meanings.sent1: The decametre is used to measure longer distances.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker measured the field using a decametre.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use a decametre to measure the height of the tree, but it was too short!
meanings.sent4: The decametre stretched out like a helpful hand, guiding us along the path.
meanings.sent5: The decametre, a giant ruler, stood tall in the classroom, ready for any measurement challenge.

meanings.definition: A line or plane that is 10 meters in length.
meanings.sent1: The decametre marked the boundary of the property.
meanings.sent2: The decametre on the map showed the distance between the two towns.
meanings.sent3: The decametre line in the sand was a clear indicator of where the game would start.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a decametre, unwavering and precise in its direction.
meanings.sent5: The decametre of sunlight stretched across the room, illuminating everything in its path.
